title: On The Waterfront, Obama Contends Bridge Repair Coffers Beg Refilling
teaser: Speaking on the Potomac River waterfront, President Obama advocated for renovating aging American infrastructure with the historic Francis Scott Key Bridge poised behind him.  NPR's Mara Liasson reports.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
